Introduction

Xu Minghao, also known for his stage name The8, is a Chinese dancer, singer, songwriter and composer under Pledis Entertainment. He is the lead dancer, sub vocalist and sub rapper of the boy group SEVENTEEN. He is also a member of their group's performance unit SVT PERFORMANCE Team.

The8 debuted as a member of SEVENTEEN on May 26, 2015 with the mini-album 17 Carat. Years later, on June 9, 2019, The8 made his solo debut through the digital single "Dreams Come True".

Fun facts

1
The8's role models are his parents.
…
2
The8 is a member of the famous 97 liners squad along with Mingyu and DK who is also from SEVENTEEN, Jungkook from BTS, BamBam and Yugyeom from GOT7, Jaehyun from NCT, and Cha Eunwoo from ASTRO.
…
3
The8 always makes sure to eat his meals without skipping any. Even if he has to wake up at 3AM, he would wake up an hour earlier to eat.
…
4
The8, as a person who is creative and loves to paint, held his first art exhibit along with Mingyu during SEVENTEEN's 3rd anniversary as a special surprise for Carats.
…
5
The8 said he watched a lot of variety shows when he was in China and he wanted to be a superstar, so that’s why he became a singer in Korea.
…
6
The8 avoids drinking cold water because of his weak stomach.
…
7
Growing up, The8's mother encouraged him to have good grades and learn singing and martial arts.
…
8
The8 has been practicing Chinese Wushu since he was 5 years old.
…
9
According to The8, he can cook, he just doesn't want to. His specializes in cooking different kinds of eggs.
…

In 2010, The8 appeared on the Chinese program ’Tian-tian-xiang-shang’.
